text: This is great, now I no longer need to have the extension in a separate tab to trigger a data refresh.

This is our first swing at "data freshness," aka keeping data in HubSpot cards and developer-built cards in sync on the page. The coolest part about this stuff is that if you `refreshObjectProperties`, any card using `onCrmPropertiesUpdate` will also get a notification (even cards built by other developers!). Let me know if you see this type of util being useful in other areas :+1:

> any card using `onCrmPropertiesUpdate` will also get a notification
Could you elaborate this part? What notifications do you mean? <@U04EJHVD8FM> thank you :thankyou:

we have a message system that allows cards to listen / send notifications to eachother. `refreshObjectProperties` essentially broadcasts a message to HubSpot cards and developer cards saying "hey, a property updated, you should refresh yourself". `onCrmPropertiesUpdate` is a way for developer cards to listen to those messages, and refresh if a property you care about changes.
basically everyone (HubSpot and developers) , can buy into the same system.
Will try there be a system in the near future to broadcast general messages? Or should be just proxy things though properties?
no. it'll be a part of similar utils/actions
I was going to post today about this, Carter, you beat me to it :slightly_smiling_face:

:balloon: *Bi-directional refresh of CRM properties between custom card & parent page*
*(*<@U01QVR44MEY> beat me to it, but here's the announcement anyway! *)*
Now developers can fetch property in custom card, and listen in for updates happening from Aywhere on the record page. They can also update a property using HubSpot's public API on a custom card, and force refresh of those properties everywhere on the page. All of these happens *without a manual page reload*. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-sdk#fetch-crm-property-data|fetchCrmObjectProperties>, <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-sdk#listen-for-property-updates|onCrmPropertiesUpdate>, and <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-sdk#refresh-properties-on-the-crm-record|refreshObjectProperties> together enable bi-directional refresh of CRM properties between custom card & parent page. And this is a baby step towards solving the problem of data freshness between extensions (custom cards) & extension points (record pages). Check out the the sample app that demonstrates all of them working together: <https://github.com/HubSpot/ui-extensions-examples/tree/main/bi-directional-property-refresh>. Changelog announcement will be coming soon.

:information_source: We are taking small steps toward solving the problem of data freshness between extensions and extension points. Keep your feedback and problems coming.
